Name: Fire escape drill
About the game: Fire escape drill 是一款火灾题材的应急仿真程序，旨在使体验者通过身临其境般的仿真操作，通过手柄与场景中的提示框与物品交互来学习火灾逃生过程，掌握火灾发生时的逃生技能及了解正确的应急处置措施，降低自身伤害。
Meta Title: Fire escape drill: Mar 6, 2020, Star yao and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fire escape drill? Check out the release date (Mar 6, 2020), developer insights from Star yao, and a complete game summary.
